stories.text:
Hey everyone,

I'd like to write something about the importance of talking to customers as rightly taught by Y Combinator.

At Unfake, we've been doing this since past 1 month or so. We are glad we did so otherwise we'd have ended up spending our time & money on developing something which would've turned out to be totally useless!

After receiving a good amount of feedback, we came up with http://blockpay.tech ! A platform using which you can send cryptocurrencies & NFTs to anyone even if they don't have a wallet.

Please share your thoughts & feedbacks on the same & consider signing-up if you find this interesting.

Here's to the new beginnings!

Peace.
